Reference

All functions

GO_similarity()

Calculate GO similarity matrix

binary_cut()

Cluster GO terms by binary cutting the similarity matrix

cluster_GO()

Cluster GO terms

cluster_by_apcluster()

Cluster GO similarity matrix by apcluster

cluster_by_dynamicTreeCut()

Cluster GO similarity matrix by dynamicTreeCut

cluster_by_igraph()

Cluster GO similarity matrix by graph community detection methods

cluster_by_kmeans()

Cluster GO similarity matrix by k-means clustering

cluster_by_mclust()

Cluster GO similarity matrix by mclust

compare_methods()

Compare clustering methods

count_word()

Calculate word cloud

dend_node_apply()

Apply functions on every node in a dendrogram

difference_score()

Difference score

edit_node()

Modify nodes in a dendrogram

guess_ont()

Guess the ontology of the input GO IDs

heightDetails(<word_cloud>)

Height for word_cloud Grob

ht_GO_clusters()

Visualize the GO similarity matrix and the classifications

random_GO()

Generate random GO IDs

scale_fontsize()

Scale font size

simplifyGO()

Simplify GO enrichment results

widthDetails(<word_cloud>)

Width for word_cloud Grob

word_cloud_grob()

A simple grob for the word cloud
